name: Sea Fable
description:
Sea Fable

When a young girl takes an offer to swap places with a mermaid, she’s suddenly introduced to a new world of friendship, magic, and palace intrigue.

Currently, we only have a demo, though the entire story is planned out! Keep checking back for more!

Features:
  • Linear story with choices
  • 5 befriendable (and romanceable) mermaids
  • 4 of 20 planned chapters
  • unfinished art!
  • characters named after objects
  • bi panic

Version 0.2.1 Updates:

  • Rewritten Ch. 1!
  • Sound effects!
  • Bug catchin'
